The iso226 module
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Functions in this module are accessed by importing ``pydsm`` and looking in the
``pydsm.iso226`` module.

.. automodule:: pydsm.iso226

Functions returning ISO 226 contours
....................................

.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.iso226_spl_contour
.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.iso226_spl_itpl

Functions computing loudness/acoustic pressure
..............................................

.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_L_p
.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_L_N

Functions returning data tabled in the standard
...............................................

.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_f
.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_alpha_f
.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_L_U
.. autofunction:: pydsm.iso226.tabled_T_f
